add_library(gx INTERFACE)
target_sources(gx
  INTERFACE FILE_SET gx_headers TYPE HEADERS BASE_DIRS include/ FILES include/gx/shared_mutex.h
)
add_library(gx::gx ALIAS gx)
# not needed with install header set
# target_include_directories(gx INTERFACE include/gx/shared_mutex.h)
install(TARGETS gx FILE_SET gx_headers)
